entry.title: DhruvShah-Dev/doc-ai: DocAI - A Local, Private Document Q&A Assistant A lightweight AI chatbot that answers questions directly from your PDFs, DOCX, and TXT files—no cloud APIs, no data leaks. Powered by Phi-2 (CPU-optimized LLM) and FAISS for semantic search, it’s designed for researchers, students, and professionals
entry.content: DocAI - A Local, Private Document Q&A Assistant A lightweight AI chatbot that answers questions directly from your PDFs, DOCX, and TXT files—no cloud APIs, no data leaks. Powered by Phi-2 (CPU-optimized LLM) and FAISS for semantic search, it’s designed for researchers, students, and professionals

entry.title: prograpedia/next-server-timing: A lightweight library for Next.js applications that adds Server-Timing headers to HTTP responses. Enables performance monitoring of server operations with precise timing metrics, helping developers identify bottlenecks and optimize application performance.

entry.title: insitewebio/scalability-kit: Scalability Kit is a lightweight, plug-and-play TypeScript library for processing tasks in batches, concurrently, and with automatic retries.
